sourcesContent:
<template>
 <button @mousedown="downloadFile">Download File</button>
</template>

<script>
import html2pdf from "html2pdf.js";

export default {
 props: ["dom", "name"],
 methods: {
   downloadFile() {
     const me = this;

     const invoice = document.querySelector(me.dom);
     var opt = {
       margin: 1,
       filename: me.name,
     };
     html2pdf().from(invoice).set(opt).save();
   },
 },
};
</script>
